verses.verse: אַ֥שְֽׁרֵי־ <WH835> 'Ash-rei- Blessed הָאִ֗ישׁ <WH376> ha-'Ish, [is] the man אֲשֶׁ֤ר׀ <WH834> 'a-Sher who לֹ֥א <WH3808> lo Nor הָלַךְ֮ <WH1980> ha-laCh that walketh בַּעֲצַ֪ת <WH6098> ba-'a-Tzat not in the counsel רְשָׁ֫עִ֥ים <WH7563> re-Sha-'Im of the ungodly וּבְדֶ֣רֶךְ <WH1870> u-ve-De-rech in the way חַ֭טָּאִים <WH2400> Chat-ta-'im of sinners לֹ֥א <WH3808> lo Nor עָמָ֑ד <WH5975> 'a-Mad; nor standeth וּבְמוֹשַׁ֥ב <WH4186> u-ve-mo-Shav in the seat לֵ֝צִ֗ים <WH3887> le-Tzim, of the scornful לֹ֣א <WH3808> lo Nor יָשָֽׁב׃ <WH3427> ya-Shav. nor sitteth

כִּ֤י <WH3588> ki for אִ֥ם <WH518> 'im lo בְּתוֹרַ֥ת <WH8451> be-to-Rat [is] in the law יְהוָ֗ה <WH3069> Yah-weh God חֶ֫פְצ֥וֹ <WH2656> chef-Tzo But his delight וּֽבְתוֹרָת֥וֹ <WH8451> u-ve-to-ra-To and in his law יֶהְגֶּ֗ה <WH1897> yeh-Geh, doth he meditate יוֹמָ֥ם <WH3119> yo-Mam day וָלָֽיְלָה׃ <WH3915> va-La-ye-lah. and night

וְֽהָיָ֗ה <WH1961> ve-ha-Yah, will be like כְּעֵץ֮ <WH6086> ke-'Etz And he shall be like a tree שָׁת֪וּל <WH8362> sha-Tul planted עַֽל־ <WH5921> 'al- by פַּלְגֵ֫י <WH6388> pal-Gei by the rivers מָ֥יִם <WH4325> Ma-yim of water אֲשֶׁ֤ר <WH834> 'a-Sher Which פִּרְי֨וֹ׀ <WH6529> pir-Yo his fruit יִתֵּ֬ן <WH5414> yit-Ten that bringeth forth בְּעִתּ֗וֹ <WH6256> be-'it-To, in his season וְעָלֵ֥הוּ <WH5929> ve-'a-Le-hu his leaf לֹֽא־ <WH3808> lo- does not יִבּ֑וֹל <WH5034> yib-Bol; also shall not wither וְכֹ֖ל <WH3605> ve-Chol all manner אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> 'a-Sher- Which יַעֲשֶׂ֣ה <WH6213> ya-'a-Seh and whatsoever he doeth יַצְלִֽיחַ׃ <WH6743> yatz-Li-ach. shall prosper

לֹא־ <WH3808> lo- are not כֵ֥ן <WH3651> chen so הָרְשָׁעִ֑ים <WH7563> ha-re-sha-'Im; The ungodly כִּ֥י <WH3588> ki for אִם־ <WH518> 'im- but כַּ֝מֹּ֗ץ <WH4671> kam-Motz, [are] not so but [are] like the chaff אֲ‍ ֽשֶׁר־ <WH834> 'asher- which תִּדְּפֶ֥נּוּ <WH5086> tid-de-Fen-nu driveth away רֽוּחַ׃ <WH7307> Ru-ach. which the wind

עַל־ <WH5921> 'al- and כֵּ֤ן׀ <WH3651> ken after that לֹא־ <WH3808> lo- Nor יָקֻ֣מוּ <WH6965> ya-Ku-mu shall not stand רְ֭שָׁעִים <WH7563> Re-sha-'im Therefore the ungodly בַּמִּשְׁפָּ֑ט <WH4941> bam-mish-Pat; in the judgment וְ֝חַטָּאִ֗ים <WH2400> ve-chat-ta-'Im, nor sinners בַּעֲדַ֥ת <WH5712> ba-'a-Dat in the congregation צַדִּיקִֽים׃ <WH6662> tzad-di-Kim. of the righteous

כִּֽי־ <WH3588> ki- for יוֹדֵ֣עַ <WH3045> yo-De-a' knoweth יְ֭הוָה <WH3068> Yah-weh For the LORD דֶּ֣רֶךְ <WH1870> De-rech the way צַדִּיקִ֑ים <WH6662> tzad-di-Kim; of the righteous וְדֶ֖רֶךְ <WH1870> ve-De-rech but the way רְשָׁעִ֣ים <WH7563> re-sha-'Im of the ungodly תֹּאבֵֽד׃ <WH6> to-Ved. shall perish
